typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Metric_Name as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Parent_UID as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		Indonesia as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		insert_datetime as timestamp,
		update_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, SLI_ID,Ops_Report_ID,Metric_Group,Metric_Sub_Group,Requirement_Question,Reference,Dimension,Reporting_Format,Report_Frequency,Active,Forest,Saw_Mill,Carbon,AUS,NZ,US,Malaysia)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(UID == Relation_UID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, SLI_ID,Ops_Report_ID,Metric_Group,Metric_Sub_Group,Requirement_Question,Reference,Dimension,Reporting_Format,Report_Frequency,Active,Forest,Saw_Mill,Carbon,AUS,NZ,US,Malaysia)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	StagingChecksum != Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_UID = UID,
		Relation_SLI_ID = SLI_ID,
		Relation_Ops_Report_ID = Ops_Report_ID,
		Relation_Metric_Group = Metric_Group,
		Relation_Metric_Sub_Group = Metric_Sub_Group,
		Relation_Requirement_Question = Requirement_Question,
		Relation_Reference = Reference,
		Relation_Dimension = Dimension,
		Relation_Reporting_Format = Reporting_Format,
		Relation_Report_Frequency = Report_Frequency,
		Relation_Active = Active,
		Relation_Forest = Forest,
		Relation_Saw_Mill = Saw_Mill,
		Relation_Carbon = Carbon,
		Relation_AUS = AUS,
		Relation_NZ = NZ,
		Relation_US = US,
		Relation_Malaysia = Malaysia,
		Relation_insert_datetime = insert_datetime,
		Relation_update_datetime = update_datetime,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Requirement_Question,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(insert_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Requirement_Question,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		insert_datetime = Relation_insert_datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForUpdate
AddAuditColumns, UpdateSelectForUpdate union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
UnionForDB alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowForUpsert
AlterRowForUpsert sink(input(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Requirement_Question as string,
		Reference as string,
		Dimension as string,
		Reporting_Format as string,
		Report_Frequency as string,
		Active as string,
		Forest as string,
		Saw_Mill as string,
		Carbon as string,
		AUS as string,
		NZ as string,
		US as string,
		Malaysia as string,
		insert_datetime as timestamp,
		update_datetime as timestamp,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['UID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Requirement_Question,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		insert_datetime,
		update_datetime,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertUpdateRow
